header.custName: 日新軟體股份有限公司

jobDetail.jobDescription:
We are looking for a Python Developer who is capable of developing interactive web pages, backend API servers, web-tracking modules, and data wrangling with Python.


What You Will Do:
- Participate in developing medium ~ large projects
- Bridge backend data to frontend web with data wrangling in the middle tier
- Collaborate with team members within and outside of the department
- Present outcomes or results in regular meetings

What You Will Need:
- 3+ years of experience in (mediumn ~ large) web projects with modern programming languages.
- expert in Python, fimiliar in using Django/Flask is a plus. (other frameworks are also good)
- proficiency in data wrangling with NumPy/Pandas or other similar library tools.
- familiar with Web API development
- basic understanding of web, HTML, javascript and css.
- knowledge of or expousre to visualization tools. (e.g. e-charts or other charting tools)
- basic understanding of version control flow, e.g. Git flow.
- development under Windows, (Linux is a plus).

What We Expect Of You: 
- a positive working attitude every single day. 
- a self-driven characteristic, and being responsible and proactive of what you do.
- comply with standards, and able to perform solo/team work
- enjoy life, and ready to embrace the unique Neutec culture.

welfare.welfare:
在日新，我們以人為本．信任夥伴．開放溝通．共享共好

◆ 我們的薪酬制度，促使同仁激勵自我與個人發展，有努力就會有收穫 
    ·  固定年終獎金1個月、考核獎金一年2次
    ·  交通津貼、年節獎金及生日禮金
    ·  年度調薪、升遷與教育訓練制度

◆ 我們的完善休假保險制度，照顧同仁的身體與心靈的健康 
     · 法令規定的勞保健保勞退當然有，除此之外我們還有團保意外險醫療險
     · 優於勞基法的休假制度：每年5天不扣薪病假、每年12天以上的特別休假
     · 年資達到5年10年，另有10天起跳的年資假
     · 年度體檢、年資健檢、哺乳室、線上諮商，每月還有護理師臨場服務

◆ 我們有福委會、社團跟許多活動，為增進同仁情誼、也希望同仁達到工作與生活平衡 
    · 國外員工旅遊(全額補助及旅遊公假)
    · 每週一次運動時間、每月一次按摩舒壓 
    · 福委會活動 ( 國內旅遊、家庭日、電影招待日、各類社團活動、慶生會等)
    · 部門一季Game Day ( 皮件手做、烘培、Go-kart、滑雪體驗 ...等豐富有趣的活動)

◆ 在日新最幸福的是..... 
     · 我們的咖啡廳有咖啡師來提供咖啡、下午茶點心，讓大家工作之餘也能放鬆心請
     · 我們有餐廳，由廚師團隊提供每日豐盛的早餐和午餐，不用煩惱每天要吃什麼
     · 我們有健身空間、器材及按摩椅，認真工作完也有機會動一動

在日新，我們的工作模式建立在互相尊重、互相信任，有貢獻就有回饋，現今正在尋找積極主動誠信的夥伴，一起創造工作的自由度與樂趣。

header.custName: 阿爾法餐飲股份有限公司

jobDetail.jobDescription:
Overview:
You will be responsible for designing and building internal backend systems that connect our ERP (NetSuite), POS, HR and membership systems. You will work closely with analysts and business teams to deliver stable, secure and maintainable services that actually help stores and operations run better.

你將負責設計與建置公司內部的系統, 串接 ERP（NetSuite, POS, 人資與會員等各項系統. 你會與分析師以及各事業單位密切合作, 提供穩定, 安全且易於維護的服務, 實際幫助門市與營運運作得更好.

What you will do:
- 使用 Python（Flask / FastAPI）開發與維護後端服務與 RESTful API
- 串接內部與外部系統：如 NetSuite（ERP）、POS、HR、會員系統、Line OA 等
- 設計與維護關聯式資料庫（如 MySQL / PostgreSQL），確保資料正確性、效能與可擴充性
- 維護雲端服務（Google Cloud Platform：Container、SQL 等）
- 使用 Git 進行版本管理，並建立與維護 CI/CD 流程進行部署
- 撰寫自動化測試（單元測試 / TDD），維持程式品質
- 系統設計與效能優化，確保系統的穩定性、安全性與可維運性

Skill you must have:
- 2 年以上後端開發經驗，具備獨立以 Python 開發 Web 後端的實務經驗
- 具備資料庫 Schema 獨立設計能力，熟悉關聯式資料庫（MySQL 或相近 DB）
- 熟悉 Git 版本控制，對 CI/CD 有實作經驗或明確概念
- 具備產品思維，願意理解業務場景，而不只是單純寫 code
- 了解基本的測試 / TDD 概念，願意實際撰寫測試來保護品質
- 熟悉 AI 自動化與協作工具（如 n8n、AnyCross、ChatGPT、Claude、Gemini 等） 

Plus  Point:
- 熟悉 Line Messaging API / Line OA、會員系統
- 有實作過 NetSuite API / SDK 客製或其他 ERP 整合經驗
- 有 DevOps / SRE 經驗（Docker、監控、Log、Alert、Security）
- 了解前端 framework（React.js、Next.js 等）
- 對 AI Agents / 自動化流程（如自動通知、對話機器人、報表生成）有實作經驗或強烈興趣
- 有深入參與 SaaS 平台開發的經驗

header.custName: TradeBeyond_香港商科銳投資控股有限公司台灣分公司

jobDetail.jobDescription:
For more than 20 years, TradeBeyond has been advancing a more efficient, responsible supply chain. Responding to retail sourcing’s need for smarter, automated workflows and data transparency, we developed the industry’s leading supply chain platform, CBX, which is relied on by many of the largest brands and retailers around the world.  
 
As consumers, businesses, and governments alike have increased their commitment to sustainability, Fortune 500 companies such as The Home Depot, REI, Safeway, Lidl, and Lululemon have turned to TradeBeyond to help optimize product development, manage suppliers, reduce waste, and improve quality and compliance. 

Learn more at TradeBeyond.com 

About the Role

You’ll join our AI team to build the Python foundation that makes our AI-powered products smarter and faster. Day to day, you’ll focus on the services for AI initiatives—working closely with AI engineers and data scientists to ship services and APIs. Over time, you’ll take on AI functionality development such as semantic retrieval and agent workflows, progressing toward ownership of AI-backed services end-to-end. 

Current success is measured by reliable services and clear interfaces; future success is stronger AI/LLM capability in the systems you help deliver—so users and customers feel the difference. 

Responsibilities: 

* Build & ship Python services and REST endpoints with clear, consistent error responses. 

* Quality & delivery: contribute tests, reviews, and branch workflows; deliver via Jenkins pipeline. 

* Reviews & Docs: participate in code/design reviews and document key technical decisions. 

* Quarterly objectives: under mentoring, deliver one scoped AI-backed mini-project each quarter. 

 

Requirements (Must-Have) 

* Programming languages: proficient in Python for production services. 

Version control & CI/CD: daily Git usage and experience running Jenkins pipelines. 

* Foundations: basic logging/metrics/health checks; ability to follow specs, document changes clearly, and deliver on time. 

* Languages: native Mandarin and intermediate-level English. 

Nice-to-Have 

* REST basics: exposure to implementing RESTful APIs (routing, versioning, status codes, pagination, auth basics) with consistent error semantics (e.g. Problem Details). 

* LLM exposure: experience calling LLM APIs with timeouts/retries and basic cost/latency awareness; prototypes or features built with OpenAI/Gemini/Azure. 

* Information retrieval: understand embeddings/vector search; experience with a vector store (pgvector or MongoDB Atlas Vector Search). 

*DB skills: comfortable in Postgres and familiar with SQL performance for API workloads. 

* Container & Cloud: exposure to container packaging (Docker) and cloud-hosted deployments (Kubernetes). 

Observability tooling: familiarity with Prometheus/Grafana dashboards or tracing basics. 

TradeBeyond Offers 
 
You will work in a flat and open team environment where your experience and expertise are valued. You will work in partnership with a leadership team who have profound domain knowledge in their functional areas and are keen to work with you to continuously make positive impacts for our customers and employees. Externally, you will be engaging with a client network on a global footprint.  

We  offer competitive compensation in a dynamic, high growth and global environment. At TradeBeyond, we value the diversity of our employees and partners. We believe that our company thrives when we support and celebrate our differences. 

We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates. All information provided by applicants will be treated in strictest confidence and handled confidentially for recruitment-related purposes within the company and our associated company. Applicants may be considered for other suitable positions within the company over a one-year period, after which their personal data will be destroyed
